name: Sprint Planning
description: Select the highest-priority backlog items that fit within one sprint's capacity, validate dependencies, and produce a ready-to-execute sprint plan

backlog-review.description: Review backlog health before planning — flag items missing acceptance criteria, xl items that need splitting, and stale items that need re-evaluation

sprint-selection.description: Select highest-priority items up to effective sprint capacity, resolve dependencies, update item statuses to in-sprint, and write the sprint plan to sprint-plan.md

done.description: Sprint plan finalized — summarize the sprint goal, selected items, and first recommended workflow to run
